quote.text: If you want to learn something, read it. If you want to understand something, write it. If you want to master something, teach it. If you want to experience something, practice it every day.
quote.author: Wisdom of Daily Practice

overview.title: What is Sadhana?
overview.subtitle: The most powerful spiritual practice to awaken your consciousness each dawn
overview.description: Sadhana is a daily spiritual practice performed during the ambrosial hours before dawn, when Earth's energy is most calm and receptive. At ACIKY, we connect virtually every morning to create a powerful wave of consciousness that extends throughout Cuba and beyond. It is a sacred moment where we unite as a spiritual community, regardless of our physical location.

card1.title: Ambrosial Hours
card1.text: We practice between 6:30 and 7:30 AM, taking advantage of the purest and quietest energy of the day for deep meditation.

card2.title: Virtual Connection
card2.text: Through digital platforms, we create a sacred circle that transcends physical distances and unites hearts.

card3.title: Structured Practice
card3.text: We follow the sequence: japji sahib, opening, warm-up, kriya, meditation, and closing with prayer.

card4.title: Gradual Transformation
card4.text: Daily consistency generates deep changes in consciousness, creating new patterns of thought and being.

benefits.title: Benefits of Daily Practice
benefits.subtitle: Transformations experienced by those who maintain sadhana discipline

card1.title: Mental Clarity
card1.text: The mind becomes clearer, more focused, and capable of making decisions from inner wisdom.

card2.title: Elevated Energy
card2.text: You start each day with renewed vitality and a higher, more stable energetic frequency.

card3.title: Spiritual Connection
card3.text: You develop an intimate and constant relationship with your higher self and universal divinity.

card4.title: Inner Discipline
card4.text: You cultivate willpower and self-discipline that extends to all areas of your life.

card5.title: Emotional Stability
card5.text: Emotions become balanced, developing greater resistance to stress and emotional reactivity.

card6.title: Sacred Community
card6.text: You form deep bonds with other practitioners committed to spiritual growth.

card7.title: Clear Purpose
card7.text: You connect daily with your life purpose and spiritual mission in the world.

card8.title: Powerful Manifestation
card8.text: You develop the ability to materialize your highest intentions with greater ease.

join.title: How to Join Online Sadhanas?
join.subtitle: Simple steps to become part of our daily practice community

step1.title: Register on Our Platform
step1.text: Contact us to receive access links to daily sessions and join our group of practitioners.

step2.title: Prepare Your Sacred Space
step2.text: Create a quiet place in your home, with a blanket, candle, or any element that helps you concentrate.

step3.title: Adjust Your Sleep Routine
step3.text: Gradually adjust your schedule to wake up early. Go to bed earlier to maintain rest hours.

step4.title: Start with Commitment
step4.text: Commit initially for 40 consecutive days to establish the habit and experience the full benefits.

tech.title: Technical Requirements
tech.subtitle: What you need to participate in our virtual sadhanas

card1.title: Connected Device
card1.text: Mobile phone, tablet, or computer with stable internet connection.

card2.title: Clear Audio
card2.text: Headphones or speakers to clearly hear instructions and mantras.

card3.title: Video Platform
card3.text: We use Zoom for our virtual sadhana sessions.

card4.title: Muted Microphone
card4.text: Keep your microphone muted to preserve the sacred group atmosphere.

tips.title: Tips for Successful Practice
tips.subtitle: Recommendations from experienced instructors to maintain discipline

card1.title: Night Preparation
card1.text: Leave clothes ready, prepare the practice space, and place the alarm far from bed to avoid falling back asleep.

card2.title: Early Hydration
card2.text: Drink a glass of water upon waking to activate the system, then wait 15 minutes before practice.

card3.title: Start Gradually
card3.text: If you're new, join Sunday sessions first, then progressively add more days.

card4.title: Create Atmosphere
card4.text: Light a candle, use essential oils, or place crystals to create a sacred environment.

card5.title: Practice Partner
card5.text: Find a friend who also practices to motivate each other and maintain accountability.
